required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Incidence of Mortality and Complications After Lung Surgery, Open Thoracic Aortic Repair, TEVAR, EVAR.
clinical_study.official_title: Incidence of Perioperative Mortality and Major Complications in Patients Who Underwent Lung Surgery, Open Thoracic Aortic Repair, Thoracic Endovascular Aortic Repair (TEVAR), and Endovascular Aortic Repair (EVAR). A Retrospective Study

brief_summary.textblock: Lung surgery, open aortic surgery, TEVAR, and EVAR are major operations that carry a higher incidence of perioperative mortality and complications compare to other surgery. The study of the incidence of mortality and complications will help the hospital to benchmark with the others. Also the study of the risk factors of mortality and major complications will help to improve the patients' outcomes.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of mortality and major complications after lung surgery
primary_outcome.description: The mortality and major complications (CVS, CNS, RS and others) will be recorded.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of mortality and major complications after open aortic surgery
primary_outcome.description: The mortality and major complications (CVS, CNS, RS and others) will be recorded.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of mortality and major complications after TEVAR
primary_outcome.description: The mortality and major complications (CVS, CNS, RS and others) will be recorded.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of mortality and major complications after EVAR
primary_outcome.description: The mortality and major complications (CVS, CNS, RS and others) will be recorded.

secondary_outcome.measure: Risk factors of mortality and major complications after lung surgery
secondary_outcome.description: To identify risk factors eg. smoking, type of surgery, age, etc.

secondary_outcome.measure: Risk factors of mortality and major complications after open aortic surgery
secondary_outcome.description: To identify risk factors eg. smoking, type of surgery, age, etc.

secondary_outcome.measure: Risk factors of mortality and major complications after TEVAR
secondary_outcome.description: To identify risk factors eg. smoking, diagnosis, age, etc.

secondary_outcome.measure: Risk factors of mortality and major complications after EVAR
secondary_outcome.description: To identify risk factors eg. smoking, age, etc.

other_outcome.description: The patients with postoperative delirium required treatment will be described.

Psoas muscle index will be used for the diagnosis of low muscle mass. Psoas muscle index = both psoas muscle area at L3 (from CT scan) divided by body surface area. Cut-off values of sarcopenia Male 68.5 cm2/m2 Female 52.5 cm2/m2
To identify risk factors eg. smoking, type of surgery, age, etc.

intervention.description: Patients underwent lung surgery including wedge resection, lobectomy, segmentectomy, and pneumonectomy.
Patients underwent open thoracic surgery or thoracoabdominal aortic surgery.

study_pop.textblock: Patients who underwent one of these types of surgery 1) thoracic surgery, 2) open thoracic aortic surgery, 3) TEVAR and 4) EVAR

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Patients underwent
- thoracic surgery
- open thoracic aortic surgery
- TEVAR
- EVAR
Exclusion Criteria:
- Emergency lung surgery
- Conversion from TEVAR to open thoracic surgery
- Conversion from EVAR to open aortic surgery
